Package com.navis.framework.portal.cache

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ICacheBasedFinder
    This interface uses cache to find results TODO the static methods in here should be moved to a class similar to HibernateApi, say CacheApi
    ICacheInEventBusProcessor
    Base ESB processor for Live data caches
    IEntityCache<K extends java.io.Serializable,V extends java.io.Serializable>
    This interface provides map-like operations and views for a cached entity.
    IEntityCacheConfiguration
    This interface should be implemented by all the cache metafield providers.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractCacheBasedFinder
    This class uses cache to find results
    AbstractEntityCache
    This class is an abstract implementation of IEntityCache
    AbstractEntityCacheConfiguration
    This class is the superclass of all the cache metafield providers.
    CacheStatus
    This class encapsulates the cache status state for a given cache.
    RxMap<K,V extends java.io.Serializable>
    This class provides a concurrent map that exposes Rx subjects for put, update and remove operations on a map
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CacheType
    Cache types of Live data cache,
